alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Pasco, north central Pinellas and north central Hillsborough Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 244 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near University to Egypt Lake-Leto. Movement was northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Temple Terrace, New Port Richey, Lutz, New Port Richey East, Keystone, Greater Northdale, Jasmine Estates, Land O Lakes, Egypt Lake-Leto, Citrus Park, Greater Carrollwood, Lake Magdalene, University, Beacon Square, Pebble Creek, East Lake, West Park, Trinity and Shady Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas
